content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Ensure that the inventory is updated correctly after each extraction or insertion to avoid discrepancies in resource management.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure to check the available space in the furnaces before inserting items to prevent overloading.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the extraction is performed only when there are items available in the furnaces to avoid empty extractions.
